formulas.description:
test 1: {!FormulaPreferredDateTime}+({!var_WorkTypeData.EstimatedDuration}/24)
End time needs to be beginning of time slot + duration + hours between time slots, (e.g. 07:00-12:00 would be 5 hours)

fields.name: DisplayTxtRates
fields.fieldText:
You Selected:


Trade: {!var_TradeSelected}


Group: {!var_GroupSelected}


Sub-Category: {!var_SubCategorySelected}


Hourly Rates excl. VAT:


R1 Rate: {!var_R1_NormalHours_Mon_Fri_Amount}


R2 Rate: {!var_R2_5_to_8_Mon_Fri_Amount}


R3 Rate: {!var_R3_Mon_to_Sun_vEarly_and_Late_Amount}


Call Out Fee: {!Formula_Call_Out_Fee}


Client Alerts:

{!var_AccountData.Client_Alert__c}


Estimated Duration: {!var_WorkTypeData.EstimatedDuration}


Expectations:

{!var_WorkTypeData.Task_Expectations__c}


Info Required:

{!var_WorkTypeData.Confirming_Task__c}


Quote Disclaimer:

{!var_WorkTypeData.Quote_Disclaimer__c}

{!var_WorkTypeData.Recommended_Job_Type__c}
